a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Track error, Atlantic Basin Tropical Cyclones, 1989 to 2017
Average forecasting error of the track of hurricanes and tropical cyclones from 24 hours to 120 hours in advance.
Track error is measured in nautical miles.
Data source: NHC, Hurricane Forecasting Error (2019)
